description:
an arithmetic coding solution for genomic data.

Genomics-oriented Context-Adaptive Binary Arithmetic Coding.

The GABAC development is continued within the Genie project (https://github.com/mitogen/genie).

As a public service, the GABAC codec is provided in good faith, but without any express or implied warranties. We also refer the reader to our LICENSE. The goal of our policy is that early release should enable the progress of science
name: GABAC
